author: weaver
msg: Adding the Cornerstone component framework that was generously donated by Jun Yang & Shan Gopalakrishnan  @ CISCO.
This project is in no way connected to Avalon's Cornerstone nor does Avalon it use any Avalon components. It was developed
- all non-java classpath resources have been moved to src/resources, this makes it easier for maven builds.
